Hello all.

Last month VPSBiT officially launched its DDoS protected servers (protected by DDOS-Guard).

[http://vpsbit.com/lithuania-ddos-protected-vps.php](http://vpsbit.com/lithuania-ddos-protected-vps.php)

We are keen to get some feedback from an active community like LET and so from now until the end of February, VPSBiT is offering DDoS protected VPS at 50% off.

The lowest cost plan, with the 50% discount, would therefore be just US$5 /month and include the following:

- 512MB RAM  
- 20GB HDD  
- 1vCPU  
- 200GB Data Transfer  
- 100Mbit Port  
- 1IPv4 

We use Xen based virtualization, and do not oversell. Many OS available, including Windows Server 2012 R2, and all the popular Linux Distros. Please do bare in mind that some OS may require a minimum of 1GB RAM.

We also have larger plans, proportional in price to the 512MB plan (i.e. 1GB cost twice as much). All DDoS plans are eligible for the discount. Custom plans also available on request.

To take get the discount, use coupon code: **DDoS50**. The discount is for life. 

If you have any questions, please feel free to post a reply or PM me.
